data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorStrength
data.value: Deal damage to the target based on the 50% of the strength of the Warrior.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyAscend
data.value: Increases all of the units stats by 15, including max health and attack.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyBattleRegeneration
data.value: Heals the caster for 100% of the casters level.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyDoubleSwing
data.value: Deal damage equal to 315% of the units attack.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyEmpowerment
data.value: Increase the highest stat of the caster by 20%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyInvigorate
data.value: Increase the maximum health of the caster by 20% of the casters highest stat.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyMeleeAttack
data.value: Deal damage to the target for 100% of the units attack.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyOpportunity
data.value: Increases a random of your stats by 50%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionAnyTotalitarism
data.value: Deals all of the units stats combined in damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerAction
data.value: Increases the strength and agility of the Caretaker by 20%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerBodySlam
data.value: Deals 20% of the Caretakers maximum health in damage to the target.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerDeathdefiance
data.value: Splits the Caretakers health deficit as healing between all allies.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerLifeblood
data.value: The Caretaker heals a target ally to full, but takes the allys' health deficit in damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerLifeForce
data.value: Deals 90% of the Caretakers health deficit in damage to the target AND the Caretaker.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerPowerAndDexterity
data.value: Deals 125% of the Caretakers combined Strength and Agility to the target.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerSacrifice
data.value: Deals 55% of the Caretakers Agility in damage, but takes damage equal to the difference between Strength and Agility.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionCaretakerZealOfHumanity
data.value: Heals target ally for 75% of the Caretakers strength, but injures himself for 50% of the amount healed.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinBlessing
data.value: Increases the target allys' highest stat by 40%

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinDesperatePlea
data.value: Heals the target for 75% of their maximum health, but decreases their maximum health by 20%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinJustice
data.value: Deals 40% of the Paladins strength in damage and heals him for 30% of his intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinPrayer
data.value: Increases the strength and intellect of the Paladin by 20%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinRaiseSpirit
data.value: The Paladin heals the target for 25% of his combined strength and intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinSerenity
data.value: Heals a random ally and deals damage to the target for 40% of the Paladins intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinThePowerOfFaith
data.value: Heals the paladin to full health, but reduces all his stats by 10%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionPaladinWrath
data.value: Deals 50% of the Paladins strength in damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistAgileMind
data.value: Deals damage for 55% of the Synergists Agility, but subtracts the difference between Agility and Intellect from the damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistAlign
data.value: Increases the intellect and agility of the Synergist by 20%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistBalance
data.value: Of Agility and Intellect, increases lowest stat by 15% and highest by 10%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistCollapsedEquality
data.value: Heals all allies for 50/37/25 % of the Synergists Intellect, but reduces intellect by 20%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistCompleteBalance
data.value: Aligns all allies health to be at the average percentage and heals them for 8% of the Synergists agility and intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistDuality
data.value: Deals 25% of the Synergists combined intellect and agility in damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistMentalAgility
data.value: Deals 115% of the Synergists Intellect in damage, subtracting the difference between Intellect and Agility.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionSynergistSynergy
data.value: Deals 145% of the Synergists combined intellect and agility as damage, but subtracts difference between them from this amount.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefBloodStealer
data.value: Deals 100% of the Thiefs agility in damage and heals him for 10% of the damage dealt.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefBorrowWeapon
data.value: The Thief uses the best attack of his allies together with his own, dealing 65% of their combined damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefCopyCat
data.value: Deals 95% of the Thiefs allies' highest stat in damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefDirtyTricks
data.value: Deals 250% of the Thiefs agility and 40% of his attack as damage to the target.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefEnvenom
data.value: Increases the attack of the Thief by 50%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefFlurry
data.value: Deals 10% of the Thiefs Attack to the target, 10% of his agility times.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefQuickAttack
data.value: Swiftly injure the target for 50% of the casters agility.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionThiefSwiftness
data.value: Increases the agility of the Thief by 40%

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorBlindRage
data.value: Deals anywhere between 175 and 75% of the Warriors strength in damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorExecution
data.value: Deals 750% attack damage if the target dies from this. Otherwise, deals 150% Weapon Damage.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorInfuriate
data.value: Increases the Warriors attack by 25% of the Warriors health deficit.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorInsanity
data.value: The Warrior deals 350% of his strength in damage to the target, but injures of his allies for 15% of the damage dealt.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorPowerStrike
data.value: Deal damage to the target based on 90% attack damage and 10% of the Warriors strength.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorRampage
data.value: The Warriors deals 150% of his strength in damage, but takes 10% damage of the damage himself.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWarriorRoar
data.value: Increases the strength of the Warrior by 40%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardArchon
data.value: Reduces maximum health by 60%, but increases intellect by 300%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardBrilliance
data.value: Increases the intellect of the Wizard by 40%.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardFireball
data.value: This ability deals damage to the target, based on 50% of the casters intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardFlameComet
data.value: Deals damage to the target for 110% of the Wizards intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardHeal
data.value: This ability heals the target player for 25% of the casters Intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardInferno
data.value: Deals damage to the target for 280% of the Wizards intellect.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardOracle
data.value: Heals all allies for 55/40/30 % of the Wizards Intellect. Percentage is dependant on number of valid targets.

data.name: AbilitiesDescriptionWizardRevitalize
data.value: The Wizard heals the target for 50% of her intellect.
